title: Simple solution to pre-game aggro
body:
A very simple issue that can be resolved is the chat room at the start of a game (especially normals).

Currently:
Player A enters the chatroom and calls "mid". 
Player B enters the chatroom and calls "mid".
Due to lag and instantaneous reporting of their own message to the chatroom,
Player A sees "Player A: mid" then "Player B: mid" and Player B sees "Player B: mid" then "Player A: mid"
Both believe they have entered the room and called their position first  (and feel righteous in their behaviour).

Players C,D,E can who sees both chats from the server will be able to tell them who got mid.  But this doesn't help A & B in most cases.

Please simply make all messages return from the server so that everyone knows who called the position first.
It would avoid so many arguments before the game even starts.

Thanks, RR

replies.body:
The chat system could do with an overhaul. It's still basically the same from when it was first coded. One thing that could be implemented is chat during loading. You won't have to hold all strategy talk in champion select, then, and it would relieve so much pressure, as well as pass the time.

Alas, this probably isn't the board for this sort of talk. This belongs more in [Player Creations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations).
